Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns

Class DNSMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns.DNSMessage
  • public final class DNSMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    A DNS protocol message.

    DNS messages are used for both queries and responses. The message consists of a header followed by question, answer, authority, and additional sections.

    See RFC 1035 for the DNS protocol specification.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess

        Parameters:
        id - the message ID
        flags - the header flags
        questions - the question section
        answers - the answer section
        authorities - the authority section
        additionals - the additional section
